name: Logo Branding Tool
author: Martin Glover

sections.description: This logo branding tool plugin is a tool for WordPress so you can change the wordpress logo on the admin login page to a logo of your own. This will enable to you brand up your login page in line with the rest of your site.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Go to Add New from the Plugins menu
  2. Choose Upload and browse to the zip file locally on your computer where you have saved the copy of logo-branding-tool.zip
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  4. Upload your custom image to the media section and then paste the link the the plugin settings

A full guide to install can be found here
sections.faq:
Can I change the link on the WordPress logo?

That’s being looked at and hopefully coming in the next release.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release

2.0

  • A few bug fixes put in place
  • Plugin now sponsored by http://www.andthenhost.com

short_description: The logo branding tool allows you to add your custom company logo to the wordpress login screen page.
